Lyrics:
There's a whole lot of things that I will forgive

Hurry up' Hurry up

You're still guilty
Cause you're stuttering
Oh oh oh oh ay ay ay
Yeah you're stuttering
Oh oh oh oh ay ay ay
Yeah you're stuttering
